Name: Change devtools language
Description: Can I change devtools language to another language which is not English?
Author: @pankajparashar

Chrome.Notes: 1. Open **Settings** (`F1` or `Shift+?`) > Preferences > In the **Appearance** section, choose a language from the **Language** dropdown > Reload DevTools to apply the new language.
Chrome.Name: Change devtools language
